resources.string: MyDiary
ข้อมูลการอัพเดท

**0.3.0.170424_1_A
 -Fix bug
 -Support simple photo function
 -Modify layout

 **0.2.9.170416_1_AH
 -fix bug

 **0.2.9.170406_1_A
 -Support auto temp save for diary 
 -Add cloudy option to share backup file
 -Add OOBE
 -Fix bug

 **0.2.8.170323_1_AH
 -Fix file issue on Android N
 -Merge Thai patch

 **0.2.8.170319_1_A
 -Fix error when memory is low
 -Fix bug
 -Modify layout
 -Implement search for topic
 -Add month mode and fix bug in calendar

 **0.2.7.170219_1_A
 -Now it is alpha version :)
 -Support simple backup
 -Optimizing add and show photo in diary
 -Fix calendar shadow bug on Android 4.2
 (If your device still have calendar issue , send mail for me!)
 -Fix click fail on topic list
ไม่ต้องแสดงอีกครั้ง
